name: Light Sword VR: Rhythm Game
description:
This is an open-source recreation of a certain VR rhythm game. It can play custom Beat Saber maps; it's as simple as putting the maps into a directory! Available on Windows and Quest (Android APK).

Find out more at its official page: chungchunwang.github.io

Check it out on Github: chungchunwang/Light-Sword-VR: Open-source VR rhythm slicing game. (github.com)

Watch its demo video:
